name: The Heart of The Forest (MattMuzi)
description:
A simple platformer made for the Weekly Game Jam#166 'Roots'

Enable fullscreen for a better experience!

You play as the Druid Kauriand. With the power to command the roots, you must protect the sacred tree known as "Heart of the forest" from the evil lumberjacks that are coming to cut it down!

Objectives: protect the tree and stay alive!

Controls:

KeyMove[A] [D]Jump[Spacebar]Pause game[M]Close game (on start)[Esc]Basic Attack[U]Long Attack[I]Root Trap[O]Root Spike[P]

Credits:

Antonio Saint'Pierre

Matteo Muzitano

Victoria Maia
